dialog.name: startup_wizard
dialog.whatsthis: Opens Reveal Analyzer with a new .rva file.
Specifies the base name of the new .rva file. The extension is added automatically.
Specifies the port that is connected to your evaluation board.
Searches for the first port that is connected to a board.
Specifies the Reveal project (.rvl) file to use.
Choose the scan chain configuration (.xcf) file to use if you program devices in a JTAG daisy chain.
Opens Reveal Analyzer with an existing .rva file.

dialog.name: Token_Manager
dialog.whatsthis:
Lists all the token sets in the Reveal project.
Name: The name of the token or token set.
Num. of Bits: The size in bits of the token values in the token set.
Value: The value that the token represents. Values must start with b', o', d', or h'.
Double-click an item to change it.
Right-click for commands.

dialog.name: specify_clock_frequency
dialog.whatsthis: Specify the period of the clock, either in nanoseconds (ns) or picoseconds (ps). Choose the scale in the drop-down menu at the right.
Specify the frequency of the clock, in either megahertz (MHz) or gigahertz (GHz). Specify the scale by choosing ns (nanoseconds) or ps (picoseconds) in the drop-down menu at the right.

dialog.name: export_waveform
dialog.whatsthis: Choose Selected signals to export only those signals selected in Waveform View.
